ygData.subject: RE: Gordon's snide comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Its funny you say that because I specifically recall running from the Hero a lot when I was a young bard too...now that I want to see him he s never there ;-)
ygData.messageBody:
Its funny you say that because I specifically recall running from the Hero a
lot when I was a young bard too...now that I want to see him he's never
there ;-)

-Faras

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Rokenn Swiftsong [mailto:rokenn@...]
> Sent: Friday, February 18, 2000 9:25 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Gordon's snide comments
>
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> >From: Mike Roach <mike.roach@...>
> >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> >To: "'eqbards@onelist.com'" <eqbards@onelist.com>
> >Subject: [eqbards] Gordon's snide comments
> >Date: Fri, 18 Feb 2000 09:15:15 -0600
> >
> >So I assume Gordon is referring to the level 47 song Niv's Melody of
> >Preservation when he says go visit your song vendors? Any
> found this yet?
> >
> >Also I have been wanting to get a hero bracer for months and
> I read that it
> >is possible you have to kill meldrath and his two mino
> guards to get the
> >hero to spawn, is this true? I have spent a great deal of
> time running
> >around the gears killing potential placeholders but have
> never gotten him
> >to
> >spawn. Additionally, I have read the hero is level 35 -
> does anyone think
> >it is possible to solo him at level 40 or does he hit like a giant?
> >
> >Questions question...
> >
> >
> >-Faras
>
> Niv's Melody of Preservation can be found in Kelethin. In my
> younger days I
> did a lot of hunting in Steamfont. The Mino Hero popped all
> too frequently
> and no one was hunting Meldrath or his guards. My guess the
> Hero is a
> standard rare spawn and you just have to kill all the trash
> around the gears
> to get him to spawn.
>
>
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
>
